page.title: 15Bright Steels (continued)
page.content:
The company believes that good communications with its employees is one of the conditions needed for commercial success. To this end all employees are encouraged to make suggestions regarding the running of the firm. Furthermore,employees are rewarded should they put forward an idea that improves production or saves the firm money.
The company has a social and welfare section that includes a sickness fund to which both employer and employee contribute. A pension scheme is also operated by the firm.
Bright Steels relationship with the community is excellent. The firm even constructed a passageway for the local primary school so that the children would avoid its ten works entrances.
